items.title: „Já to třeba vůbec nevěděl, že jsme mohli vypadnout. Vůbec jsem si to neuvědomoval, možná kluci z lavičky to vnímali víc, ale já vůbec nevěděl, že máme balon od vyřazení,“

“Happiest for our players. (Offensive line coach) George Barnett has done a great job,” “The way they've all stuck to it. You , all three of the guys that are doing that (Beau Stephens, Logan Jones, Gennings Dunker)”

“Sometimes you’ll see the northern lights as far south as Italy, Spain, China, or even Texas,” “But those places almost never get the fast-moving green auroras. They’ll usually see a red glow, sometimes purple or blue, but mostly red. The red lights are very different — they’re faint, barely visible to the eye and they mostly show up in photos. The green ones can be incredibly bright and fast-moving”

“Because we are talking about Italian recipes, there were some social media comments that were not really enthusiastic, saying, ‘We have been doing these recipes for years now; these scientists want to teach us how to do new things; cooking should be more about love rather than science,’”
